attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That government grants should be made available to UK residents if they wish to relocate to other EC countries, to assist with removal costs etc. this would make more homes and employment available in UK. If you support this proposition please sign my petition.

rejection.details: The petition title should not be a name, it should be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
